QuestData.Title: Some Assembly Required
QuestData.Description: Well, I've got the basic shape of the boots worked out, and they're coming along fine, but the skins you brought aren't going to be quite enough for the inner layers.$b$b"What are we going to do, Drizzlik?" No doubt the question on your lips, and well, isn't it lucky you're talking to Drizzlik, because he's going to tell you what we're going to do!$b$bThe inner layers will never really be seen, so we'll just get some of the thicker, cheaper skins from the crocs around Lake Nazferiti to fill the boots out.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 5 Snapjaw Crocolisks Skins to Drizzlik at Nesingwary's Expedition.
QuestData.CompletionText: Drizzlik's Excelsior leather boots, finest workmanship, one-hundred percent high quality saltwater crocolisk skin boots. None finer!$b$bCan't beat a glowing description like that, can you?$b$bExcept, maybe, if you have those skins for me?
QuestData.RewardText: My boots... they're like sausages, $n. Look great, taste great. I tell you they're filled with nothing but the finest ingredients and meats, and you eat it, and you love it.$b$bIt's safer--and more enjoyable--if you just trust me, and don't ask too carefully what's really inside.
